title: League won't start
body: It's been a little while since I played league about a week or two so I was thinking I might as well go ahead and play, I clicked the launcher the logo appears then quickly disappears, I thought it was really nothing so a waited a bit, after I minute of waiting cause that's a lot of time for this game to start up for me I try again and continued to try, every time I tried it didn't start, my internet is good in fact usually full bars and I know this refurbished inspiron can handle the game and run it as I played before on this computer at a manageable speed. So I'm here stuck wondering why on earth is this game not running so I decided that I may as well ask here to see if I can get an answer.

replies.body: yea me and my friend are having the same problem different networks n pc and still wont work
after around 12 hours of waiting it finally launched (: thanks again

> [{quoted}](name=lostminer,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=a1nT13NK,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-02-15T19:25:07.256+0000)
>
> after around 12 hours of waiting it finally launched (: thanks again

I was sleeping most of the time though
bty thank you all for the help when and if the patcher shows up ill make sure to run  the patcher every day I can (that doesn't mean play the  game every day though)
It took like a whole day before I could play league after taking a 3 month break from it cus of all the patching
I just tried it, it doesn't seem like it's working.

> [{quoted}](name=lostminer,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=a1nT13NK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-06T01:20:36.380+0000)
>
> I just tried it, it doesn't seem like it's working.

Since you haven't launched the game in a while, it may take a little while for the patcher to complete it's patch.

Hey Lostminer,

It sounds like the game is having trouble patching the patcher! Could you try to run the game in administrator mode? You can do that by right-clicking the league launcher, and selecting 'Run as an administrator'

Let  me know if this works out!
